title: Pop up notifications like notify-send
body: This is a really awesome project.One thing that the supercool Bash on Ubuntu on Windows must have is notify-send or something like these. Those pop ups are really great and would be a great addidtion to it.

comments.body: Windows has a different notification system. In effect that you need a completely different notify-send binary for it.
It would be great to have bash notifications integrated in the Windows 10 Action Center!
